content: The Left has no one but themselves to blame. What the EO giveth, the EO taketh away. The real issue here is the gross expansion of presidential powers. The Founders were very leery of a president morphing into a king and specifically limited the power of the office. Over the years, particularly under Woodrow Wilson, FDR, JFK, and LBJ — and due in large part to the Left’s Constitution-is-a-living-document bullshit — the powers of the presidency grew hugely. It’s worked out well for the Left (with the exception of the Bush years). Liberals — being the children they are — don’t seem capable of seeing beyond the current crisis so they welcomed a president who could unilaterally make things happen. By selecting a disaster of a candidate and then not voting for her, you’ve not only put (what you consider) a “madman” at the wheel, but by increasing his power, you’ve also given him the keys and a full tank of gas. Are you awake now?
